title: In Trump's Recollection Of Shooting, Special Note For Secret Service
content: A day after Donald Trump survived an assassination bid at his last campaign rally, the former US President Donald Trump praised the Secret Service officials for their heroic actions.

title: Man Charged With Murder By UK Police After Bodies Were Found In Suitcase
content: A suspect has been charged with murder after the bodies of two men, one of whom was from France, were found dumped in suitcases on a well-known UK bridge, police said on Monday.
summary: A suspect has been charged with murder after the bodies of two men, one of whom was from France, were found dumped in suitcases on a well-known UK bridge, police said on Monday.

title: 30 Hours Since Trump Survives Assassination Bid, Hunt Continues For Motive
content: Over 30 hours after a bullet pierced Donald Trump's ear at a rally ahead of the US' biggest election, the motive behind the high-profile assassination attempt remains unknown.

title: AI Chip Demand Drives Taiwan Chipmaker's Second Quarter Profits Up By 30%
content: The world's largest contract chipmaker, whose customers include Apple and Nvidia, has benefited from a surge towards AI that has pushed TSMC's stock - and the broader Taiwan market - to record highs.
summary: The world's largest contract chipmaker, whose customers include Apple and Nvidia, has benefited from a surge towards AI that has pushed TSMC's stock - and the broader Taiwan market - to record highs.

title: China's Third Plenum Addresses Economic Challenges, Sets Long Term Reforms
content: China's ruling Communist Party commenced its so-called third plenum on Monday, a major meeting held roughly once every five years to map out the general direction of the country's long-term social and economic policies.
summary: China's ruling Communist Party commenced its so-called third plenum on Monday, a major meeting held roughly once every five years to map out the general direction of the country's long-term social and economic policies.

title: Instagram Model Forced Followers Into Sex Work, Kept Them As Slaves
content: Former Brazilian model and US-based wellness influencer Kat Torres has been sentenced to eight years in prison for the human trafficking and slavery of women, after an FBI investigation found that two women living with her had gone missing in 2022.
summary: Former Brazilian model and US-based wellness influencer Kat Torres has been sentenced to eight years in prison for the human trafficking and slavery of women, after an FBI investigation found that two women living with her had gone missing in 2022.

title: "I'm Supposed To Be Dead": Trump Recalls Rally Attack In Latest Interview

title: Trump's Makeover To Convention Speech After Assassination Attempt

title: Political Implications Of Trump Assassination Bid For US Amid Uncertainty
